code: /* eslint-disable react-hooks/exhaustive-deps */import axios from"axios";import{useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useMessage}from"./useMessage";export const useAllTournament=()=>{const{showMessage}=useMessage();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[tournaments,setTournaments]=useState([]);const getTournaments=useCallback(()=>{setLoading(true);axios.get("http://localhost:8080/apiTournament/get").then(res=>setTournaments(res.data)).catch(()=>{showMessage({title:"大会取得に失敗しました",status:"error"});}).finally(()=>{setLoading(false);});},[]);return{getTournaments,loading,tournaments};};
